caption.p: Inhibition of Edwardsiella tarda by ( a) agar disc diffusion and ( b) agar overlay well diffusion assays. A: aqueous control; B: aqueous test; C: chloroform control; D: chloroform test; E: methanol control; F: methanol test; C 30: chloramphenicol, 30 µg/disc; 10 μL/disc and 50 μL/well used for agar disc diffusion and agar overlay well diffusion assays, respectively. Figure and caption reused from Purkait et al. [ 88]. Used under the Creative Commons License ( http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ (accessed on 26 February 2021)).
